#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll int
#define dd double
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define mp(x,y) make_pair(x,y)
#define vi vector<ll>
#define pii pair<ll,ll>
#define vpi vector<pair<ll,ll> >
#define modu 1000000007
ll ar[4123456];
int main()
{
    cin.sync_with_stdio(0);
    cin.tie(0);
    ll t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        register ll i,j,k,l,m,n,flag=0,ans=0;
        cin>>n;
        ll hash[123]={0};
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            cin>>ar[i];
            hash[ar[i]]+=1;
        }
        sort(ar+1,ar+1+n);
        for(i=1;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(hash[ar[i]]==1)
            {
                ans=ar[i];flag=1;break;
            }
        }
        if(flag==1)
        {
            printf("%d\n",ans);
        }
        else printf("%d\n",ar[n]);
    }
    return 0;
}
